statements: UPDATE students SET enrollment_status='active' WHERE name='John Smith';

UPDATE students SET email='newemail@example.com', enrollment_status='active' WHERE name='Alice';
UPDATE students SET enrollment_status='inactive', email='oldemail@example.com' WHERE name='Bob';

UPDATE Courses SET course_credit = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;

UPDATE Courses SET course_credit = 4, course_name = 'Advanced Math' WHERE course_id = 101;

UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'Prof. Smith' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET name='Alice', email='alice@example.com', enrollment_status='Enrolled' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE enrollments SET enrollment_date='2022-09-01' WHERE student_id=1 AND course_id=101;
